summary: LG-branded home appliances repair service center page
known_issues: Current LG logo implementation does not match official LG branding
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Official LG Electronics logo with red circle and white 'LG' text on transparent background, optimized for web header display (lg-logo.dim_180x60.png)

existing_features.title: Create a new service center landing page with sections for different home appliance categories (refrigerators, washing machines, air conditioners, microwaves, dishwashers, TVs)
Add a service request section where users can select their appliance type, describe the issue, and submit a service request
Display service center features section highlighting 24/7 support, certified technicians, genuine parts, and warranty service
Add a FAQ section with common service-related questions and expandable answers
Include a contact information section with phone number, email, and service center locations
Apply a professional, corporate design theme inspired by LG service centers with clean typography, organized sections, and a trustworthy visual style using blues, whites, and grays
Replace the current "24x7 Care" logo and branding in the Header component with the LG logo, maintaining the existing header layout and structure
Update the header tagline from "Always here for you" to an LG Appliance repair services appropriate tagline such as "Life's Good" or "Expert Appliance Care"
Update the color scheme from the current corporate blue to LG's signature red (#A50034) as the primary brand color, maintaining professional appearance and readability
Update typography to use LG's brand typeface or a close web-safe alternative (such as LG Smart/LG Display alternative) with clean, modern sans-serif styling
Update the footer branding and copyright text to reference LG Electronics and LG Service Center instead of the current branding
Replace the current SVG-based LG logo in the Header component with the official LG Electronics logo image asset, maintaining the existing header layout and structure
Apply comprehensive LG brand theme across all page sections including hero section, appliance category cards, service features, service request form, FAQ accordion, and contact information sections
Update background colors, border treatments, and card designs across ServiceCenterPage to align with LG brand identity using subtle grays and whites with LG red accents
Ensure all icons, badges, and graphical elements throughout the page complement the LG brand aesthetic with appropriate sizing, spacing, and color treatments

new_feature_requests.summary: Service center page for home appliances with LG-style layout
Extend backend to store service requests with appliance type, model number, issue description, customer contact details, and submission timestamp
Replace branding with LG logo and styling to match LG Appliance repair services
Replace with proper official LG logo and apply complete LG-branded theme across entire page
